description:
The Senior Sales Training and Enablement Manager will design, develop, and implement Training Programs specifically tailed for our sales and service teams.

The trainings should be designed and delivered to increase the skills, capabilities, efficiency and ultimately performance.

Programming spans across the entire lifecycle of a sales reps career at INDG from new-hire onboarding through the ongoing development needed as reps advance in their roles and careers.

Primary Responsibilities :
• Trains existing sales and service representatives
• Determines appropriate instructional design procedures / methods and develops corresponding curriculum and reference guides utilizing the latest training methodology.
• Develops effective communication vehicles to ensure training programs are fully understood and appropriately valued by the sales channel and other stakeholders.
• Conducts needs analysis studies to determine training needs and delivery methods.
• Ensures an accurate and timely process for delivering training and workshops.
• Continuously works with management to identify areas to optimize efficiency and results.
• Actively tracks sales team progress and monitors the effectiveness of existing training, evaluates projected new curricula and programs to determine overall effectiveness.
• Identifies and finds solutions to potential training problems which may be systemic to Bloomberg Industry Group.
• Actively collaborates with stakeholders to effectively coordinate and plan training activities for different groups with the main focus of helping to get new hires better aligned with the business objectives during on boarding activities.
• Effectively leads and manages the sales START representatives and other development programs.
• Actively contributes to both overall Sales Operations and Bloomberg Industry Group objectives.
• Maintains knowledge of how Bloomberg Industry Group products and services are used in our industry to better train Bloomberg Industry Group employees to present and position products to meet the customers' needs.
• Participates in special projects and performs other duties as assigned.

Job Requirements :
• Demonstrated ability to originate a creative and innovative approach to sales training needs, using latest technology and approaches to adult learning.
• Proven ability to be a self-starter, goal oriented, comfortable with a changing environment, possess excellent communication skills, and have the ability to work collaboratively required.
• Excellent presentation and facilitation skills.
• Ability to effectively work in groups, prepare and give relevant, targeted presentations to large and small audiences, and train clients on how to navigate online services.
• Ability to communicate effectively over the phone for extended periods of time.
• Ability to utilize effective selling skills.
• Detail oriented, organized, efficient and professional.
• Strong proficiency in Microsoft Office Tools, especially MS Access (tables, queries, reports), MS Excel (formulas, macros, pivot tables, formatting), PowerPoint and Word.
• Ability to travel within the United States as needed or required, which may include overnight and / or weekend travel.

Education and Experience :
• Bachelor’s degree.
• Minimum 2+ years of sales training or sales management experience with demonstrated success in a related environment.
• At least 5+ years’ successful professional sales experience in a related environment.
• Demonstrated experience creating multi-day training programs preferred.
• Prior experience in the financial / tax / accounting industry preferred
